name: CUSTOM SERVICE U-PART WIG
description:
CUSTOM ORDERS ARE AVAILABLE FOR EVERY QUEEN, WE PROVIDE THE HAIR!

WE NOW OFFER HAIR EXTENSIONS WEFTS!

This Custom U-Part wig allows you to incorporate your own hair through a small u-shaped opening at the very top of of the wig. This opening gives you the option to wear your own part exposing the scalp for a more natural looking hair style.

Cap Construction: We use Dome Caps, are ventilated quality wig cap with adjustable straps. Hand sewn using the fold over method. You can shift the unit from middle or side.

Please let me know if you like your U-Shape Small with very leave out, or Medium-Large leave out.

Time It Will Take: It will take 1 to 2 weeks to complete or less.

You will need to purchase your hair in addition to purchasing this service. This purchase does not include hair only making the U-Part Wig.

name: Curly Virgin Brazilian Hair- 3 Bundles
description:
Our virgin Brazilian hair 100% chemically unprocessed, true to length hair with medium to low luster. Our wefts are reinforced to prevent shedding & all cuticles run in the same direction to prevent tangles & matting.

Our CURLY texture is a spiral curl pattern. This look speaks to the wild child in every girl. This hair requires a bit more maintenance as curly hair tends to need more moisture. It can be worn as a wash & go look or,as all of our virgin hair, it can be colored/dyed, straightened or curled to your hearts desire.

YOU MUST PURCHASE THE CUSTOM WIG SERVICE & THE WEFTS IN YOUR DESIRE LENGTHS.

name: CUSTOM FULL LACE WIG Services
description: A Full Wig is composed with weft hair extensions sewn to a cap in the same fashion of traditional sewn installs and is composed just like the U-part Wig with the exception of the “U” shape cut out being left open at the top. Full Wigs are closed and covered at the top with the use of a closure unit. A closure is an oblong shaped durable transparent or slightly flesh tinted lace base with hair attached intended for use when closing any full head weave or use with closing a wig unit. Closures can be placed directly on top or on the side of your install depending on your custom preference and provide the look of a natural looking parting in the hair which is often optional for placement as middle or side part. Full Wigs with closures allow easy on installs and can be easily removed and reinstalled daily without sewing the unit down. You will need to purchase your hair in addition to purchasing this service. This purchase does not include the hair, This service includes making the Full-Lace Wig.

name: Loose Wavy Virgin Peruvian Hair- 3 Bundles with Closure
description:
Description

3 pcs 100g 5A Peruvian Virgin hair weft Loose Wavy

Can be easily straightened, curled or bleach/dyed

100% Virgin human hair machine weft Grade AAAAA

· No tangling or shedding

· Last over a year with proper care

Recommend 3 packs for full head.

YOU MUST PURCHASE THE FULL LACE WIG SERVICE AND THE BUNDLE PACKAGE WITH CLOSURE.
